movies.title: The Day of the Great Adventure

biography.placeOfBirth: Kwiltsch, Prussia, Germany [now Kwilcz, Wielkopolskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Franciszek Brodniewicz was born on November 29, 1892 in Kwiltsch, Prussia, Germany. He was an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935), Pan Twardowski (1936) and Doktór Murek (1939). He died on August 17, 1944 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Franciszek Brodniewicz

biography.bio: Kazimierz Junosza-Stepowski was born on November 26, 1880 in Venice, Veneto, Italy. He was an actor, known for Le rebouteux (1937), The Day of the Great Adventure (1935) and Vibrante jeunesse (1934). He died on July 5, 1943 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Kazimierz Junosza-Stepowski

biography.placeOfBirth: Lódz, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland]
biography.bio: Franciszek Dominiak was born on August 28, 1897 in Lódz, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935), Love or a Kingdom (1936) and Grzeszna milosc (1929). He died on October 23, 1984 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Franciszek Dominiak

biography.placeOfBirth: Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire [now Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland]
biography.bio: Michal Halicz was born on October 10, 1888 in Warsaw, Poland, Russian Empire as Leopold Blomberg. He was an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935), Zaraza (1922) and Kochanka Szamoty (1927). He died on March 1, 1969 in London, England.
biography.name: Michal Halicz

biography.placeOfBirth: Augustów, Poland, Russian Empire [now Augustów, Podlaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Antoni Rózycki was born on May 31, 1885 in Augustów, Poland, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935), O czym marza kobiety (1937) and Czarna perla (1934). He died on February 5, 1967 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland.
biography.name: Antoni Rózycki

biography.bio: Jan Bochenek is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: Jan Bochenek

biography.bio: S. Oppenheim is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: S. Oppenheim

biography.bio: S. Groszkowski is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: S. Groszkowski

biography.bio: Andrzej Fronczysty is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: Andrzej Fronczysty

biography.placeOfBirth: Zakopane, Galicia, Austria-Hungary [now Zakopane, Malopolskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Helena Roj-Rytardowa was born on April 16, 1899 in Zakopane, Galicia, Austria-Hungary [now Zakopane, Malopolskie, Poland]. She was an actress, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935). She died on July 19, 1955 in Zakopane, Malopolskie, Poland.
biography.name: Helena Roj-Rytardowa

biography.bio: M. Jakubowski is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: M. Jakubowski

biography.bio: Franciszek Lapinski is an actor, known for The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: Franciszek Lapinski

biography.bio: Feliks Zukowski was born on May 30, 1904 in Riga, Russian Empire. He was an actor, known for Niedaleko Warszawy (1954), Za zaslona (1938) and Jasne lany (1947). He died on January 17, 1976 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland.
biography.name: Feliks Zukowski

biography.bio: Saturnin Zórawski was born on August 4, 1920 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He was an actor, known for Powrót (1960), Lydia Ate the Apple (1958) and Motylem jestem, czyli romans czterdziestolatka (1976). He died on September 30, 1977 in Warsaw.
biography.name: Saturnin Zórawski

biography.bio: Jan Marusarz is an actor, known for Bialy slad (1932) and The Day of the Great Adventure (1935).
biography.name: Jan Marusarz
